caption.center: HIRSHORN ET AL. v. GOLDEN, EXECUTOR.

opinion.posture: A proceeding to determine heirship in the settlement of the estate of a deceased person. Petition dismissed.
opinion.opinion_text: Judgment affirmed en banc without written opinion. Mr. Chief Justice Hilliard and Mr. Justice Moore not participating.
opinion.posture: Error to the County Court of the City and County of Denver,Hon. C. E. Kettering, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Mr. JOSEPH P. CONSTANTINE, Mr. FRANK A. BRUNO, Mr. HAROLD REED, for plaintiffs in error.
Mr. NATHAN I. GOLDEN, pro se.Page 308
